name: Lorraine's Salmon Baked with Herbed Butter
ingredients: 1 cup fresh parsley, chopped fine, about 20 grams

instructions.en: Mix the softened butter, chopped parsley, minced garlic, and chopped capers (if using).
Place each salmon fillet in the center of a square of foil and season with salt and pepper.
Cut 2 deep slashes into each piece of fish and spread the herbed butter into the cuts.
Cut the lemon slices in half and push one piece into each cut in the fish.
Seal the foil around the salmon to form packets; place them on a baking sheet.
Bake at 375Â°F for 10-15 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through.
Remove the lemon slices before serving.

notes: This recipe makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. The original recipe creator doesn't care for capers and left them out, so they are optional.
